title: Mobile&Ubiquitous Comp
description: Investigates the infrastructure required to develop mobile and ubiquitous computing applications and establishes major research themes and experimental practices.Credit not awarded for both CS 4605 and CS 7470.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2261 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or (ECE 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and ECE 2035 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
